SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern

Record Class Padding

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.Padding
Record Components:
min - minimum size of string before padding happens.
max - maximum size of string before truncating happens.
leftPad - if the left hand side will be truncated to meet min
leftTruncate - if the left hand side will be truncated to meet max.
public record Padding(int min, int max, boolean leftPad, boolean leftTruncate) extends Record
FormattingInfo instances contain the information obtained when parsing formatting modifiers in conversion modifiers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Padding

      public Padding(int min, int max, boolean leftPad, boolean leftTruncate)
      Creates an instance of a Padding record class.
      Parameters:
      min - the value for the min record component
      max - the value for the max record component
      leftPad - the value for the leftPad record component
      leftTruncate - the value for the leftTruncate record component

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static Padding of(int min, int max)
      Create padding info.
      Parameters:
      min - if min is less than zero and not Integer.MIN_VALUE left pad will be disabled.
      max - if max is less than zero left truncate will be disabled.
      Returns:
      format info.

    • valueOf

      public static Padding valueOf(String str) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to parse a string such as "5", ".7", "5.7" or "-5.7" into a Padding.
      Parameters:
      str - A String to convert into a Padding object
      Returns:
      A newly created and appropriately initialized Padding object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the pattern is not valid.

    • format

      public void format(StringBuilder buf, CharSequence s)
      Pads the input sequence based on this instance of padding info.
      Parameters:
      buf - buffer to append padded string.
      s - input.

    • toString

      public final String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.
      Specified by:

    • hashCode

      public final int hashCode()

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
